title: Elegant Ruby & Diamond Floral Stud - Chettu Mogga Kammalu
features: Floral motif with a central, vibrant ruby surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The delicate openwork design mimics the 'chettu mogga' (flower bud) pattern, lending a traditional touch to the modern design. Claw setting for the ruby, prong setting for the diamonds.
occasions: and as a thoughtful gift for anniversaries or birthdays. Can be worn for both traditional and modern events.
description: This exquisite stud earring seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. The vibrant ruby, complemented by the brilliant diamonds, creates a stunning visual appeal. Crafted with high-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail, it's a timeless piece that will be cherished for years to come. Durable and comfortable for daily wear. The floral design symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
